# DelayedReveal.reveal property

Reveal a batch of hidden NFTs

## Example

```javascript
// the batch to reveal
const batchId = 0;
// reveal the batch
await contract.revealer.reveal(batchId, "my secret password");
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
reveal: {
        (batchId: BigNumberish, password: string): Promise<Omit<{
            receipt: ethers.providers.TransactionReceipt;
            data: () => Promise<unknown>;
        }, "data">>;
        prepare: (batchId: BigNumberish, password: string) => Promise<Transaction<Omit<{
            receipt: ethers.providers.TransactionReceipt;
            data: () => Promise<unknown>;
        }, "data">>>;
    };
```

## Remarks

Reveal the NFTs of a batch using the password.
